text: As of 2015, there was only one translation of the Tirukkural available in Finnish. ==History of translations== The translation by Pentti Aalto made in 1972 is the only translation of the Tirukkural into Finnish. It was published in Helsinki by the Societas Orientalis Fennica. ==Translations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text-align:center; width:25%;"|Translation !Kural, couplet or verse, No. 72 (Chapter 8, Ystävällinen Teko) |- | style="text-align:center;"|Pentti Aalto, 1972||Rakkaudettomat omivat kaiken itselleen, Rakastavat antavat luunsakin toisille. |} ==See also== * Tirukkural translations * List of Tirukkural translations by language == Notes == Finnish Category:Finnish-language literature Category:Translations into Finnish
title: Tirukkural translations into Finnish
